name: HSP_ACCT_OTHR_PROV
description: This table contains hospital account other providers information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple "other providers" can be stored in one hospital account, each provider will have a unique line number.

columns.name: OTHER_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: OTH_PRV_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the role associated with an "other provider" stored in the hospital account.
